alert.note: Alert for Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:05PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rabun, northwestern Pickens and northeastern Oconee Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 905 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Walhalla, or near Salem, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walhalla, Pickens, Liberty, Norris, Six Mile, Salem, Lake Keowee, Jocassee Gorges, Lake Jocassee and Devils Fork State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
